TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MountOperationResult extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: is returned as a result when a request for information is send by the mounting operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GLib.MountOperationResult Aborted = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The user requested the mount operation to be aborted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GLib.MountOperationResult Handled = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The request was fulfilled and the user specified data is now available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GLib.MountOperationResult Unhandled = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The request was unhandled (i.e. not implemented).
